desc: Tees Valley Firewood, the home of Teessides best locally sourced and produced kiln dried firewood. Sustainable, value for money, top quality hardwood and softwood logs, kindling and firelighters. Free local delivery, professional advice and backup. Recommended by trade professionals and happy customers alike.

layout.text: Quality, value and service. Teessides premier 'Ready to Burn' accredited firewood producer.
